articles.title: WhatsApp Clone - Angular, GraphQL, Apollo, TypeScript and PostgreSQL
articles.description: An open-source full-stack example app made with Angular 7.2, TypeScript, GraphQL Subscriptions, GraphQL Code Generator, GraphQL Modules, PostgreSQL and TypeORM.
